sentence.Network_en: This system of industries is mounting to a splendor that shall dazzle and illumine the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个工业体系日益发展,将光照人寰,举世瞩目.

sentence.Network_en: Innovation, opening and development illumine the eye of the word.
sentence.Network_cn: 改革, 开放和发展点亮了世界的眼睛.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French illuminer, from Latin illuminare (see illuminate)

entry.def: To illumine something means the same as to illuminate it.

example.ex: The interchange of ideas illumines the debate...
example.tran: 思想的交锋使辩论熠熠生辉。

example.ex: By night, the perimeter wire was illumined by lights.
example.tran: 到了夜里,周遭的铁丝网都被灯光照亮。

sentences.sentence: "This lamp lightens the room a bit"

auth_sentence.content: Gas-lighting came to Dublin in 1825, in time to illumine the new premises.
